summary: REQ-7 appears implemented by reordering the LandingPage sections and updating the desktop header nav so About is first with smooth scrolling. REQ-8 is partially implemented by referencing portfolio image paths in projects/caseStudies content and rendering them on case study pages with alt text/captions, but the diff shows no added static image assets themselves. REQ-9 appears implemented via updated leadership positioning copy in siteContent.json and its use in Hero/About sections.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the images found in the provided portfolio file into relevant landing-page sections and case study pages using static frontend assets.
missing_requirements.reason: While the code/content now references image paths under /assets/portfolio and renders them on case study pages, the diff shows no newly added static image asset files; therefore it is not evidenced that the provided portfolio images were actually added to the frontend as static assets.
evidence: MODIFIED FILES list shows 'Added: 0' and no asset/image files added

hallucinated_features.description: Hero section adds/uses generated background and wordmark image assets under /assets/generated.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on About/Work reorder, portfolio images under provided portfolio file, and leadership positioning copy; it does not request adding or integrating new 'generated' hero background/wordmark assets.
